ASharp.NAME: A Sharp
ASharp.DESCRIPTION: Note A. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

CMajor.NAME: C Major
CMajor.DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Gain [R] and draw !M! card.
CMajor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Gain [R] and draw !M! cards.

Jam.NAME: Jam
Jam.DESCRIPTION: Note A. NL Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Harmony.

CMinor.NAME: C Minor
CMinor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Apply 1 Sadness. NL Gain [R].

TripleTime.NAME: Triple Time
TripleTime.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more, gain [R].

SteelScale.NAME: Steel Scale
SteelScale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scale: Gain !M! Block.

ShowMustGoOn.NAME: The Show Must Go On
ShowMustGoOn.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive unblocked damage, gain 1 Happy.
ShowMustGoOn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive unblocked damage, gain 1 Happy. NL The attacking enemy gains 1 Sadness.

Feedback.NAME: Feedback
Feedback.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Sad, Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Resonance.NAME: Resonance
Resonance.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to each enemy equal to its amount of debuffs. NL Gain Block equal to your amount of buffs.
Resonance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to each enemy equal to its amount of debuffs + 2. NL Gain Block equal to your amount of buffs + 2.

RoarOfTheCrowd.NAME: Roar of the Crowd
RoarOfTheCrowd.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a chord, gain 1 Happy.
RoarOfTheCrowd.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a chord, gain 1 Happy per enemy.

HarmonicScale.NAME: Harmonic Scale
HarmonicScale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block per enemy, X times. NL Scale: Gain !B! + !M! Block instead.

TheSilentsSaga.NAME: The Silent's Saga
TheSilentsSaga.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, then discard a card. NL Add a Shiv to your hand. NL Apply 3 Poison to ALL enemies.
TheSilentsSaga.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, then discard a card. NL Add a Shiv to your hand. NL Apply 3 Poison and Weak to ALL enemies.

TheWatchersWhispers.NAME: The Watcher's Whispers
TheWatchersWhispers.DESCRIPTION: Enter Calm or Wrath. Exit your stance at the start of your next turn.
TheWatchersWhispers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter Calm or Wrath. Exit your stance at the start of your next turn. NL Add a Miracle to your hand.

TheDefectsDrama.NAME: The Defect's Drama
TheDefectsDrama.DESCRIPTION: Add a Defect Power card to your hand. NL Exhaust.
TheDefectsDrama.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Defect Power card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

TheBardsLament.NAME: The Bard's Lament
TheBardsLament.DESCRIPTION: Add a Story card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
TheBardsLament.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded Story card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

TheNarrativeOfNeow.NAME: The Narrative of Neow
TheNarrativeOfNeow.DESCRIPTION: If you die, return to life with !M!% of your HP.

LayeredMelody.NAME: Layered Melody
LayeredMelody.DESCRIPTION: Note B. NL Gain !B! Block and !M! Plated Armor.

LeadIn.NAME: Lead-In
LeadIn.DESCRIPTION: Note A. NL Your next attack deals !M! more damage.

Arpeggio.NAME: Arpeggio
Arpeggio.DESCRIPTION: Attacks have Note A. NL Skills with Block have Note B. NL Other Skills have Note C.
Arpeggio.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Attacks have Note A. NL Skills with Block have Note B. NL Other Skills have Note C.

Bop.NAME: Bop
Bop.DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage, where X is the number of cards you've played this turn.
Bop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage to ALL enemies, where X is the number of cards you've played this turn.

DaCapo.NAME: DaCapo
DaCapo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Chord, copy the Notes an additional time.

Rest.NAME: Rest
Rest.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain [R] next turn. NL End your turn. NL Scale: Gain an additional 2 Energy next turn.

SeizeTheMoment.NAME: Seize the Moment
SeizeTheMoment.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Reduce the cost of this card by !M! this combat.

Octet.NAME: Octet
Octet.DESCRIPTION: Copy the next card you play 7 times, then end your turn. NL Exhaust.
Octet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Copy the next card you play 7 times, then end your turn.

MiddleC.NAME: Middle C
MiddleC.DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Play the top Note A or Note B card from your deck.
MiddleC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Play the top Note A AND the top Note B card from your deck.

Chime.NAME: Chime
Chime.DESCRIPTION: Note B. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card.
Chime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Note B. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw two cards.

PleadForMercy.NAME: Plead for Mercy
PleadForMercy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever an enemy attacks you this turn, they gain !M! Puppet.

SubliminalTones.NAME: Subliminal Tones
SubliminalTones.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! Puppet to ALL enemies.

WallOfSound.NAME: Wall of Sound
WallOfSound.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Apply !M! Puppet to ALL enemies. Then gain X block, where X is the amount of Puppet among ALL enemies.

PuppetShow.NAME: Puppet Show
PuppetShow.DESCRIPTION: Note C. NL Apply !M! Puppet to ALL enemies, and 6 extra Puppet to Minions.

Dance.NAME: Dance
Dance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Scale, apply !M! Puppet to ALL enemies.

DiscordantScreech.NAME: Discordant Screech
DiscordantScreech.DESCRIPTION: Note A. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

Compose.NAME: Compose
Compose.DESCRIPTION: Note B. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Scale: They lose an additional 2 Strength this turn.
